sources.title: Relaxing Harp Music
sources.description: Elizaveta Alexandrova Reinhold Glière - Concerto for Harp and Orchestra in E-flat major, Op. 74 Oksana Sidyagina N. Rota - Sarabande and Toccata for harp J. Peshetti - Sonata for harpsichord in C minor A. Renier - "Reflection" H. Berlioz - "Dance of the Sylphs" for harp solo M. Mchedelov - Variations on a theme by Paganini for harp Sofia Kiprskaya 00:00:01 Bach: Toccata and Fugue in D Minor 00:08:35 Smetana: Vltava (Die Moldau) 00:18:04 Kiprsky : Concertino for Harp and String Quartet 00:30:05 Debussy: Sonata for Flute, Harp and Viola 00:49:15 Renié: Ballade Fantastique for Harp (1912) 01:01:43 Liszt: Liebestraum No. 3 in A-flat major 01:07:10 Prokofiev: Prelude Valérie Milot Bedrich Smetana, trans. H. Trnecek Mà Vlast: Vltava (Moldau) Amy Turk Danny Elfman - Sally's Song Lavinia Meijer Lavinia Meijer plays a piece titled, "Metamorphosis Two" from the minimalist composer, Philip Glass in the church of the Hervormde Gemeente Kortenhoef . Héloïse de Jenlis Debussy - Deux Arabesques Ella Dawn Jenkins, aka " EllaHarp " (paternal granddaughter of Gordon Jenkins ) Monaghan Jig
